snippet: Pope John Paul II and Pope John XXIII will be made saints, the Vatican said on Friday, announcing that a second miracle had been attributed to John Paul.
lead_paragraph: Pope John Paul II and Pope John XXIII will be made saints, the Vatican said on Friday, announcing that a second miracle had been attributed to John Paul.

headline.main: Two Former Popes to Be Made Saints
headline.print_headline: Two Former Popes Are Accepted for Sainthood
